entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit support. How may I help you today?
Yeah, I need to return this VeloBand Pulse I bought. It's junk!
I understand you'd like to return your VeloBand Pulse. I'm happy to help. Can I get your order number, please?
Ugh, fine. It's #VF12345. But seriously, this thing is inaccurate and the battery life is terrible. I thought I was getting a decent smart watch, not a paperweight.

Thank you. Let me pull up your order. Okay, I see the order for the VeloBand Pulse placed on August 1st. So today is August 16th. You're well within our return policy, which is 90 days for most items.
90 days? Seriously? Well that's a relief! I was starting to think I was stuck with this thing. I was looking for something like a smart watch and this clearly isn't it.
Yes, sir. Our return policy is quite generous. I can go ahead and process that return for you right away. We'll send you a prepaid shipping label to the email address we have on file.
Great! How long will it take to get my refund?
Once we receive the VeloBand Pulse, it usually takes 7-10 business days for the refund to reflect in your account.
Okay, that sounds good. So just to confirm, I just box up the VeloBand Pulse, slap on the label you're emailing me, and drop it off at the post office?
That's correct. You don't need to contact a manager or anything else, it's all taken care of. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

No, that's it. Thanks so much! I appreciate the quick and easy return process. This has been so much easier than I expected, I appreciate the generous return policy and I thought I only had 10 days. I'll be sure to buy my next smart watch from VeloFit!
You're very welcome! We appreciate your business. Have a great day!
